message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. Would you like to purchase it from me for $15000?
I'm really interested in the product, but $15000 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a lower price?
I understand you're on a budget, but I'm not sure I can go as low as $8000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $11000?
I appreciate your flexibility, but $11000 is still a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a lower price?
I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go below $11000. How about we try $10500?
I'm really close to making a decision, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $9500?
I'm not sure I can go as low as $9500. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $9500 and $10500, so how about $10000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $9000?
I'm not willing to go as low as $9000, but I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $9250?
